snippet: The authorities said the man stabbed himself and then a woman before police shot fatally shot him in the Oakland Gardens section of Queens.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said the man stabbed himself and then a woman before police shot fatally shot him in the Oakland Gardens section of Queens.

headline.seo: Police Fatally Shoot Man During Stabbing in Queens
headline.main: Police Kill Man as He Stabs Woman
headline.print_headline: Police Kill Man as He Stabs Woman
